solution_line_template: First find the new number of birds: {initial_birds} birds - {eaten_birds} birds = <<{initial_birds}-{eaten_birds}={remaining_birds}>>{remaining_birds} birds
Then find the new total number of animals: {initial_monkeys} monkeys + {remaining_birds} birds = <<{initial_monkeys}+{remaining_birds}={total_animals}>>{total_animals} animals

Then divide the number of monkeys by the number of animals and multiply by {percentage_multiplier}% to express the answer as a percentage: {initial_monkeys} monkeys / {total_animals} animals * {percentage_multiplier}% = {percent_monkeys}%
